// 商品详情页 import React from 'react' import '../../utils/flexible' import './detail.scss' import { Carousel } from 'antd'; import { Modal, Button } from 'antd'; import { Input } from 'antd'; import { message } from 'antd'; class Detail extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { visible: false, // 购物车商品的数量 count: 1 }; this.showModal = this.showModal.bind(this); this.goCar = this.goCar.bind(this); this.handleOk = this.handleOk.bind(this); this.handleCancel = this.handleCancel.bind(this); this.reduce = this.reduce.bind(this); this.add = this.add.bind(this); this.buyNow=this.buyNow.bind(this) } showModal = () => { this.setState({ visible: true, }); }; // 点击确定回调 handleOk = e => { console.log(e); this.setState({ visible: false, }); }; // 点击遮罩层或右上角叉或取消按钮的回调 handleCancel = e => { console.log(e); this.setState({ visible: false, }); console.log(6666) }; // 点击确定，去购物车 goCar(props) { console.log(this.props) this.setState({ visible: false, }); // 不生效了 message.success('添加成功！', 2.5); } // 选择商品点击减号的时候 reduce() { console.log("减少了") if(this.state.count < 2){ console.log("不能再少了") return }else{ this.setState({ count:this.state.count-1 }) } console.log(this.state.count) } // 选择商品点击加号的时候 add() { console.log("添加了") this.setState({ count:this.state.count+1 }) console.log(this.state.count) } buyNow(){ console.log("立即购买") const {history}=this.props; this.add(); history.push('/cart') } render() { return (
